trans-unit.source: Loop Map Operations - Usage and Examples
trans-unit.target: Loop Map Operations - Usage and Examples

trans-unit.source: Loop <token>mapop</token>s
trans-unit.target: Loop <token>mapop</token>s

trans-unit.source: There are two Loop <token>mapop</token>s in <token>af_integration_full</token>: <legacyBold>ForEach Loop</legacyBold> and <legacyBold>MapEach Loop</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: There are two Loop <token>mapop</token>s in <token>af_integration_full</token>: <legacyBold>ForEach Loop</legacyBold> and <legacyBold>MapEach Loop</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Loop <token>mapop</token>s provide the following benefits:
trans-unit.target: Loop <token>mapop</token>s provide the following benefits:

trans-unit.source: When an input message contains repeating elements, a Loop flattens the hierarchy in the output document.
trans-unit.target: When an input message contains repeating elements, a Loop flattens the hierarchy in the output document.

trans-unit.source: To perform data manipulation, like concatenating fields or applying a mathematical formula, a Loop can use an expression and output the results.
trans-unit.target: To perform data manipulation, like concatenating fields or applying a mathematical formula, a Loop can use an expression and output the results.

trans-unit.source: A Loop filters an input document based on criteria and outputs the filtered data.
trans-unit.target: A Loop filters an input document based on criteria and outputs the filtered data.

trans-unit.source: Loop <token>mapop</token>s:
trans-unit.target: Loop <token>mapop</token>s:

trans-unit.source: Map Operator
trans-unit.target: Map Operator

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Output
trans-unit.target: Output

trans-unit.source: ForEach Loop
trans-unit.target: ForEach Loop

trans-unit.source: Loops over a repeating record in the source document.
trans-unit.target: Loops over a repeating record in the source document.

trans-unit.source: Relationships defined within the ForEach Loop container are evaluated at each iteration of the loop.
trans-unit.target: Relationships defined within the ForEach Loop container are evaluated at each iteration of the loop.

trans-unit.source: There is no record in the target document and there are no output links.
trans-unit.target: There is no record in the target document and there are no output links.

trans-unit.source: ForEach is typically used to flatten a source loop hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: ForEach is typically used to flatten a source loop hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: It cannot output a record.
trans-unit.target: It cannot output a record.

trans-unit.source: Requires one input parameter and one optional parameter:
trans-unit.target: Requires one input parameter and one optional parameter:

trans-unit.source: Source
trans-unit.target: Source

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: A repeating record in the source document or a List <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: A repeating record in the source document or a List <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: Condition

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a filter for the records to iterate.
trans-unit.target: Acts as a filter for the records to iterate.

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: MapEach Loop
trans-unit.target: MapEach Loop

trans-unit.source: Loops over a repeating record in the source document.
trans-unit.target: Loops over a repeating record in the source document.

trans-unit.source: Relationships defined within the MapEach Loop container scope are evaluated at each iteration of the loop.
trans-unit.target: Relationships defined within the MapEach Loop container scope are evaluated at each iteration of the loop.

trans-unit.source: Each iteration of the loop produces an instance of the repeating record in the target document.
trans-unit.target: Each iteration of the loop produces an instance of the repeating record in the target document.

trans-unit.source: Requires one input parameter and one optional parameter:
trans-unit.target: Requires one input parameter and one optional parameter:

trans-unit.source: Source
trans-unit.target: Source

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: A repeating record in the source document or a List <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: A repeating record in the source document or a List <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: Condition

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a filter for the records to iterate.
trans-unit.target: Acts as a filter for the records to iterate.

trans-unit.source: A record is created in the target document.
trans-unit.target: A record is created in the target document.

trans-unit.source: Set Scope with Direct Links
trans-unit.target: Set Scope with Direct Links

trans-unit.source: The ForEach Loop and MapEach Loop have a container.
trans-unit.target: The ForEach Loop and MapEach Loop have a container.

trans-unit.source: All <token>mapop</token>s added to the container execute in the scope of that Loop container.
trans-unit.target: All <token>mapop</token>s added to the container execute in the scope of that Loop container.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the Loop container, the MapEach Loop has the Set Scope icon: <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="742e2a35-5168-4735-a04b-8a05f7299308" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline>.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the Loop container, the MapEach Loop has the Set Scope icon: <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="742e2a35-5168-4735-a04b-8a05f7299308" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline>.

trans-unit.source: When a MapEach Loop is added to the <token>transform</token> design area, Set Scope is automatic, as indicated by the arrow <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="742e2a35-5168-4735-a04b-8a05f7299308" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline>.
trans-unit.target: When a MapEach Loop is added to the <token>transform</token> design area, Set Scope is automatic, as indicated by the arrow <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="742e2a35-5168-4735-a04b-8a05f7299308" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline>.

trans-unit.source: To work in the Home container or any other container, select the arrow to unset the Set Scope icon: <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="fac35ba9-5681-4b98-9237-58d97b58dbef" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline>.
trans-unit.target: To work in the Home container or any other container, select the arrow to unset the Set Scope icon: <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="fac35ba9-5681-4b98-9237-58d97b58dbef" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline>.

trans-unit.source: When linking a repeating record in the source document to a repeating record in the target document, a MapEach Loop is needed.
trans-unit.target: When linking a repeating record in the source document to a repeating record in the target document, a MapEach Loop is needed.

trans-unit.source: Creating these links from each source node to the target node is often time consuming.
trans-unit.target: Creating these links from each source node to the target node is often time consuming.

trans-unit.source: As a result, <token>af_integration</token> includes Direct Link functionality.
trans-unit.target: As a result, <token>af_integration</token> includes Direct Link functionality.

trans-unit.source: Direct Linking includes the following features:
trans-unit.target: Direct Linking includes the following features:

trans-unit.source: Automatically does a bulk direct link of a repeating record and its nodes on the source schema to the target schema.
trans-unit.target: Automatically does a bulk direct link of a repeating record and its nodes on the source schema to the target schema.

trans-unit.source: A MapEach Loop (with Set Scope enabled) is automatically created when you link repeating records in the source schema to repeating records in the target schema.
trans-unit.target: A MapEach Loop (with Set Scope enabled) is automatically created when you link repeating records in the source schema to repeating records in the target schema.

trans-unit.source: Automatically does a bulk direct link of non-repeating records and its nodes on the source schema to the target schema.
trans-unit.target: Automatically does a bulk direct link of non-repeating records and its nodes on the source schema to the target schema.

trans-unit.source: To use the Direct Link functionality of a repeating record
trans-unit.target: To use the Direct Link functionality of a repeating record

trans-unit.source: Draw a link from a repeating record in the source document to the repeating record in the target document.
trans-unit.target: Draw a link from a repeating record in the source document to the repeating record in the target document.

trans-unit.source: A dialog window displays the following options:
trans-unit.target: A dialog window displays the following options:

trans-unit.source: Option
trans-unit.target: Option

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Simple Link
trans-unit.target: Simple Link

trans-unit.source: Creates a link between the repeating records.
trans-unit.target: Creates a link between the repeating records.

trans-unit.source: The node links under the repeating record are not created.
trans-unit.target: The node links under the repeating record are not created.

trans-unit.source: A MapEach Loop is not created.
trans-unit.target: A MapEach Loop is not created.

trans-unit.source: Map Each
trans-unit.target: Map Each

trans-unit.source: Adds a MapEach Loop (with Set Scope enabled) and creates a link between the two repeating records.
trans-unit.target: Adds a MapEach Loop (with Set Scope enabled) and creates a link between the two repeating records.

trans-unit.source: Node links under the repeating records are not created.
trans-unit.target: Node links under the repeating records are not created.

trans-unit.source: Link by Structure
trans-unit.target: Link by Structure

trans-unit.source: Adds a MapEach Loop (with Set Scope enabled) and creates a bulk link between the repeating records and their node links.
trans-unit.target: Adds a MapEach Loop (with Set Scope enabled) and creates a bulk link between the repeating records and their node links.

trans-unit.source: A MapEach Loop is created for every link between the source and target repeating records.
trans-unit.target: A MapEach Loop is created for every link between the source and target repeating records.

trans-unit.source: Link by Name
trans-unit.target: Link by Name

trans-unit.source: Adds a MapEach Loop (with Set Scope enabled) and creates a bulk link between the repeating records and their node links that have the same name.
trans-unit.target: Adds a MapEach Loop (with Set Scope enabled) and creates a bulk link between the repeating records and their node links that have the same name.

trans-unit.source: A MapEach Loop is created for every link between the source and target repeating records.
trans-unit.target: A MapEach Loop is created for every link between the source and target repeating records.

trans-unit.source: If the names do not match, a link is created between the two repeating records in the MapEach Loop.
trans-unit.target: If the names do not match, a link is created between the two repeating records in the MapEach Loop.

trans-unit.source: Node links under the repeating records are not created.
trans-unit.target: Node links under the repeating records are not created.

trans-unit.source: Cancel
trans-unit.target: Cancel

trans-unit.source: Cancels the link and returns to the Home container.
trans-unit.target: Cancels the link and returns to the Home container.

trans-unit.source: A MapEach Loop is only used when creating a link between repeating records in the source and target schemas.
trans-unit.target: A MapEach Loop is only used when creating a link between repeating records in the source and target schemas.

trans-unit.source: If the source <legacyUnderline>or</legacyUnderline> target record is non-repeating, a MapEach Loop is not automatically created.
trans-unit.target: If the source <legacyUnderline>or</legacyUnderline> target record is non-repeating, a MapEach Loop is not automatically created.

trans-unit.source: In this situation, create the links under the scope of an existing MapEach Loop.
trans-unit.target: In this situation, create the links under the scope of an existing MapEach Loop.

trans-unit.source: To use the Direct Link functionality of a non-repeating record
trans-unit.target: To use the Direct Link functionality of a non-repeating record

trans-unit.source: Draw a link from a repeating record in the source document to a non-repeating record in the target document.
trans-unit.target: Draw a link from a repeating record in the source document to a non-repeating record in the target document.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>OR</legacyBold>, draw a link from a non-repeating record in the source document to a repeating record in the target document.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>OR</legacyBold>, draw a link from a non-repeating record in the source document to a repeating record in the target document.

trans-unit.source: A dialog window displays the following options:
trans-unit.target: A dialog window displays the following options:

trans-unit.source: Option
trans-unit.target: Option

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Simple Link
trans-unit.target: Simple Link

trans-unit.source: Creates a link between the records.
trans-unit.target: Creates a link between the records.

trans-unit.source: The node links under the records are not created.
trans-unit.target: The node links under the records are not created.

trans-unit.source: Link by Structure
trans-unit.target: Link by Structure

trans-unit.source: Creates a bulk link between the records and their node links.
trans-unit.target: Creates a bulk link between the records and their node links.

trans-unit.source: Link by Name
trans-unit.target: Link by Name

trans-unit.source: Creates a bulk link between the records and their node links that have the same name.
trans-unit.target: Creates a bulk link between the records and their node links that have the same name.

trans-unit.source: If the names do not match, a link is not created between the two records.
trans-unit.target: If the names do not match, a link is not created between the two records.

trans-unit.source: Node links under a record are not created.
trans-unit.target: Node links under a record are not created.

trans-unit.source: Cancel
trans-unit.target: Cancel

trans-unit.source: Cancels the link and returns to the Home container.
trans-unit.target: Cancels the link and returns to the Home container.

trans-unit.source: A MapEach Loop is only used when creating a link between repeating records in the source and target schemas.
trans-unit.target: A MapEach Loop is only used when creating a link between repeating records in the source and target schemas.

trans-unit.source: If the source <legacyUnderline>or</legacyUnderline> target record is non-repeating, a MapEach Loop is not automatically created.
trans-unit.target: If the source <legacyUnderline>or</legacyUnderline> target record is non-repeating, a MapEach Loop is not automatically created.

trans-unit.source: In this situation, create the links under the scope of an existing MapEach Loop.
trans-unit.target: In this situation, create the links under the scope of an existing MapEach Loop.
